column2: UPDATE 2-Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway quarterly profit jumps almost one third Feb 27 Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc  on Saturday said fourth-quarter profit rose 32 percent
column3: helped by improved results in its insurance operations and higher gains from investments and derivatives.

column2: UPDATE 2-Samsung wins appeal in patent dispute with AppleSamsung wins appeal in patent dispute with AppleApple CEO Tim Cook commits to annual dividend raise Chief Executive Tim Cook said on Friday Apple Inc is committed to raising its dividend annually
column3: a move designed to please investors but also a sign the world's most famous technology company may no longer be a growth stock.  Apple CEO Tim Cook commits to annual dividend raise Chief Executive Tim Cook said on Friday Apple Inc is committed to raising its dividend annually
column4: a move designed to please investors but also a sign the world's most famous technology company may no longer be a growth stock. A U.S. appeals court on Friday overturned a $120 million jury verdict against Samsung

column2: Disney resets theme park ticket prices for slow
column4: Feb 27 Walt Disney Co  unveiled new single-day ticket prices on Saturday for the company's U.S. theme parks
column5: switching to a three-tiered system that charges visitors more on the year's busiest days and less during typically slower periods.
